content: Wow, you could have been describing my marriage EXACTLY. I think I had the same conversation about going to the beach once! But yes, he’s there to ground me so that my balloon of awesome ideas doesn’t go floating off into space. He’s the one who makes the crazy dreams I have turn into reality. Thanks for a great article. We’ve been married for nearly 20 years now (!!) and a lot of what you said we figured out on our own. But it’s always nice to know that other people have similar challenges.
